div.p: Defines requiredness behavior for selecting an action or an action group
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/action-required-behavior defines the following codes:

tr.td: An action with this behavior must be included in the actions processed by the end user; the end user may not choose not to include this action
An action with this behavior may be included in the set of actions processed by the end user
An action with this behavior must be included in the set of actions processed by the end user, unless the end user provides documentation as to why the action was not included

description.value: Defines requiredness behavior for selecting an action or an action group

definition.value: An action with this behavior must be included in the actions processed by the end user; the end user may not choose not to include this action
An action with this behavior may be included in the set of actions processed by the end user
An action with this behavior must be included in the set of actions processed by the end user, unless the end user provides documentation as to why the action was not included
